title: Love Games
description: When you're undercover you have one job... never break character International spy, Candice Glower, has a job given to her - she must infiltrate a new club to see if it's owned by the Martinis, the Italian mob family. Normally these spy missions are easy, but Candice is thrown for a loop when she meets Johnny "Blue-Eyes" Bishop, the club owner and potential member of the Italian mob.  Johnny Blue-Eyes is suave, handsome, and successful - and there's just one other thing about him that she can't quite put her finger on. With time running out and her cover about to be blown, will Candice be able to get the vital information she needs to build a case against the Martinis? And can she figure out what's so attractive and different about Johnny without getting her emotions and real identity in the way?   This 8k erotic romance contains steamy and sexy situations. Adult readers only.   keywords: m/f, new adult sex
author: Violette Paradis
